author: joern
msg: UIMA-2125 Improved selection handling when an annotation is updated

author: noelgrandin
msg: PIVOT-730 NullPointerException when selecting across multiple text spans
rework the paragraph node data structures to accomodate text inside Span nodes

author: fitzner
msg: c-binding: Implementation of Mixins Major parts of this patch was provided by Armin Mueller, Holger Grandy

author: dag
msg: DERBY-5185 store/rollForwardRecovery.sql stuck in RAFContainer4.recoverContainerAfterInterrupt() during shutdown
Patch derby-5185-2b which fixes state a state maintenance bugs (in
FILE_IO_INTERRUPTED. The first fixes the immediate problem.
It also adds a maximum number of retries for the readPage code and
fixes some cases whereby the state variable "threadsInPageIO" could
risk not being properly update when exceptions would get thrown. The
latter may be the underlying reason for what we see here.
